about_the_game:
Greetings, my friend.
Reading this, you show that you care about this game. Which is very important for us.
I ask you to go through it completely imbued with it.
Yes, it does not have an overly rich plot, but it will leave you and your friends with only positive and vivid emotions.
We, Sour Sugar, have tried our best to make this particular game a new breakthrough in cooperative games.
All you will see is a project being built in stages, which each of you can complement with your own brick.
Around the penetrating plot, you will see many features, thanks to which BIGDRUM will forever remain in your heart.
Install it soon and have fun!
Will you be able to find the culprit? It all depends on you and the support of your friends.

GAMEPLAY


In the game "BIG DRUG" you have to wander through the streets of your city, hoping to find the lost drugs of the gang. As you progress, you will communicate with bandits where you will need to choose the right words and expressions so that you are not revealed as a rat.

KEY FEATURE


* Online co-op up to 4 players *
Play with friends or go alone

* Unique treasure hunt system *
You have to search for treasures with friends or alone, as in childhood, focusing on buildings and places.

* Communicate with characters *
Communicate with them and find out information that will help you in passing.

* Run away from the cops *
Run away from the cops so that you and your friends are not imprisoned.

* The game is funny *
The game is designed for you to have fun and have a good rest.

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains drugs and murder
